scripts.tsc: rimraf dist && npm run link-core && npm run tsc-only
scripts.registry-publish: npm run build-package-json && npm publish dist
scripts.registry-publish-canary: npm run build-package-json && npm publish --tag canary dist
scripts.clean-deps: rimraf yarn.lock && rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npm i
scripts.build: npm run clean-deps && rimraf dist && npm run build-prod-no-cleanup
scripts.build-prod-no-cleanup: npm run before-build && npm run tsc && npm run build-package-json && npm run sass && npm run copy-assets && npm run after-build
